title: VMware security advisory (AV25-565)
description: Between September 2 and 3, 2025, VMware published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: Tanzu Platform for Cloud Foundry  version prior to 10.0.9
Tanzu Platform for Cloud Foundry  version prior to 10.2.2+LTS-T
Tanzu Platform for Cloud Foundry  version prior to 6.0.19+LTS-T
VMware Tanzu GemFire Management Console  version prior to 4.0
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
